item.title: Trump AG highlights three Tesla arson cases, adding to White House defense of Musk's company
item.description: Tesla and SpaceX boss Elon Musk, the world's richest man, donated more than $250 million toward President Trump's successful presidential campaign.

item.title: German upper house of parliament OKs debt reform, half-trillion fund
item.description: Germany's upper house of parliament on Friday passed a reform of the country's borrowing rules and a 500-billion-euro fund to revamp its infrastructur...

item.title: Pentagon to brief Musk on top-secret plan for potential war with China, NYT reports
item.description: Elon Musk, U.S. President Trump's close ally, on Friday will be briefed on plans for any possible war with China, the NYT reported, citing U.S. offici...

item.title: 'Buy Tesla,' Commerce chief Lutnick urges as Musk leads DOGE for Trump administration
item.description: President Trump last week opened the White House lawn to become a Tesla showroom, with Elon Musk showing him a Cybertruck and other electric vehicles.

item.title: European leaders push for even more defense spending — despite plans for $867 billion 'ReArm' package
item.description: "I think this is only the start," Lithuanian President Gitanas Nausėda told CNBC's Silvia Amaro on the EU's plans to boost defense spending.
